title: New: Apache Jackson – Iced Milk
content:
It’s been a while since we’ve featured the Portland based artist Apache Jackson. His last EP, Soul Damage, really took us all of guard. It was a quietly disturbing array of Rn’B jams that tested ones nerves as well as the grooves in ones limbs. His new track, Iced Milk, perhaps explains the time in hiatus. Not only is the record tonally more succinct, but the pace and structure of the track lends far greater to the narratives Jackson seeks to explore. By the end of the track it becomes a frightening cacophony of regurgitated sounds; in a very good way.

Stream the new track and video below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d24
